name: The Chronicles of Ekos - Eve
description:
This is the penultimate version of the demo, one that has been in development since I obtained RPG Maker MZ. Thank you for your patience!

Play as Eve, a young amnesiac who awakens deep within Durna Forest. Meet new friends, challenge ancient evils, and uncover the mysteries of the world while discovering the truth about your past.

(Post Release Update)

-Updated Credits Sequence.
